section-1-council_key3: The council will be elected by the **members** of a NavGurukul campus and would be responsible to represent the campus, ensure **learning** of one and all while ensuring smooth **management** of the day-to-day operations. This council is comprised of 7 members to simplify work distribution among the different members of the council:
section-1-council_key11: One of the eligible members from general body will be appointed as the **General Secretary**.
section-1-council_key12: Every **three months**, elections will be held for appointment of members to the council.
section-1-council_key13: A **general body meeting (GBM)** will be held every month to **review** the performance of the Council. The minutes of the meeting (MOM) will be recorded and be posted in a public blog maintained by the Outreach and Communications Coordinator.
section-1-council_key14: The coordinators can act independently to resolve the issues and improve upon the existing solutions in consultation with the Board of Governors. A student cannot hold more than two places in the Council. The council members will record the decisions electronically to ensure transparency in the governance channel specific to the campus.
